flags.bit: Bits 31:30 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 29 DACRST: DAC interface reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 28 PWRRST: Power interface reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 27 BKPRST: Backup interface reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 26 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 25 CANRST: CAN reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 24 Reserved, always read as 0.
Bit 23 USBRST: USB reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 22 I2C2RST: I2C2 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 21 I2C1RST: I2C1 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 20 UART5RST: USART5 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 19 UART4RST: USART4 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 18 USART3RST: USART3 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 17 USART2RST: USART2 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 16 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 15 SPI3RST: SPI3 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 14 SPI2RST: SPI2 reset Set and cleared by software.
Bits 13:12 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 11 WWDGRST: Window watchdog reset Set and cleared by software.
Bits 10:9 Reserved, must be kept at reset value.
Bit 8 TIM14RST: TIM14 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 7 TIM13RST: TIM13 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 6 TIM12RST: TIM12 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 5 TIM7RST: TIM7 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 4 TIM6RST: TIM6 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 3 TIM5RST: TIM5 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 2 TIM4RST: TIM4 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 1 TIM3RST: TIM3 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
Bit 0 TIM2RST: TIM2 timer reset Set and cleared by software.
